snippet: The Chinese artist and activist, who had just taken his first overseas trip in four years, said that he had uncovered several listening devices hidden around his work space and living room.
abstract: The Chinese artist and activist, who had just taken his first overseas trip in four years, said that he had uncovered several listening devices hidden around his work space and living room.

headline.main: Ai Weiwei Returns to Beijing to Find Listening Devices in His Studio and Home
